gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 116, Spurs 93
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks win their sixth straight game as they defeat the Spurs, 116-93. Kyrie Irving recorded 34 points (15-22 FG, 4-9 3pt. FG), nine rebounds and seven assists for the Mavericks, while Luka Doncic added 27 points, nine rebounds and eight assists in the victory. Victor Wembanyama tallied 26 points, nine rebounds, five assists and three blocks for the Spurs in the losing effort. The Mavericks improve to 32-23 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 11-44.
